attributes.action: Add an option to electoral ballot papers to record public vote of no confidence.
attributes.additional_details:
Encourage party politics, manifesto promises and government policy that people can vote for.

As opposed to the current practice of voting defensively against.

Voter turnout;

https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/general-election-2019-turnout/

From this information it can be seen that a large proportion of the electorate is disengaged and so not represented.

The last 7 years shows me that government is increasingly incompetent, self-serving and fails to represent the majority interest.
attributes.background: Provide constitutional change allowing representative democracy to reflect the will of the majority of the electorate by providing a voting category of "No confidence" which if selected must be counted as a valid vote giving an electable option enabling the voting public to withhold their mandate.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Add a "None of the above" option for General Elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617575 

Include 'I am not represented' on all ballot papers.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616694
